description: Mayor Stephanie Rawlings-Blake and the Baltimore Office of Promotion & The Arts have announced CityPaint 2012: Baltimore Mural Program.  This initiative will decorate Baltimore City with numerous murals this year. As part of the Cleaner, Greener Baltimore program, the city is partnering with neighborhood groups, community organizations, artists and corporations for CityPaint 2012.

metadata.attribution: The Baltimore Office of Promotion & The Arts

name: Baltimore City Murals Project 1987 to Present
